titles.title: A bill to temporarily delay application of proposed changes to the Departmental Appeals Board within the Department of Health and Human Services.
A bill to temporarily delay application of proposed changes to the Departmental Appeals Board within the Department of Health and Human Services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: Prohibits the Secretary of Health and Human Services from taking any administrative action for one year to finalize or otherwise implement provisions contained in the proposed rule published on December 28, 2007, relating to the Department of Appeals Board established in the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS), including provisions allowing the Secretary to review, amend, or reverse Board decisions.
